Topic.Title: Shield - hands on impression from the booth

Message.Msg: That price tag is what keeps making me think the Shield will not be a large success. I mean, I get it that the cost of putting together the device merits the price tag, but that is still a lot of dough for what is a device that will likely be in addition to an xbox360 or ps3 for most games...on top of their smart phone also.

Topic.Title: Shield - hands on impression from the booth

Message.Msg: unlike the ps or xboz, nvda also wants you to buy a new one every year and a half or whatever when a new processor comes out. how many will buy into that?

Topic.Title: AMD dropped 13% despite rev beat - why were investors spooked?
AMD dropped 13% despite rev beat - why were investors spooked?

Message.Msg: Who was it that said there was no margin in consoles? Oh yeah That would be Nvidia when they turned down the business. Good move Jen!

Topic.Title: AMD dropped 13% despite rev beat - why were investors spooked?

Message.Msg: Now that AMD got both of them pregnant they should be brave enough to go back to them and raise prices by 10% or more! AMD will not survive if they don't do that. I hope they man up!

Topic.Title: Shield - hands on impression from the booth

Message.Msg: Apparently several tens of millions of gamers and graphics users buy into that model. For a few hundred dollars they can make a major performance upgrade, while leaving most of their installed software unchanged. You don't have to "believe", you only need to observe. And invest, or not, based on sales. Doing otherwise is like believing that there is no market for BMWs because a bus stop is near your house, or because a Kia is cheaper.

Topic.Title: Shield - hands on impression from the booth

Message.Msg: Wow Watergatefive just ripped you a new one.. showed how stupid you truly are.. and a douche..
